column.name: system_id
column.descr: Unique System ID for each payment record

column.name: parent_id
column.descr: The insurance product/plan/policy that this information is related to

field.text.validate-msg:
Please ensure that this field contains a valid GUID32.
The format of a GUID32 is xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx where x is an uppercase letter or digit.

column.name: cvg_type_id
column.descr: The type of incident for which these values are being stored.

column.name: cvg_type
column.descr: The type of incident for which these values are being stored. This value is relevant only if cvg_type_id = Other

column.name: ind_deduct_amt
column.descr: Individual deductible amount for this type of incidents

column.name: fam_deduct_amt
column.descr: Family deductible amount for this type of incidents

column.name: percent_pmt
column.descr: Percentage of bill paid (for this type of incidents) by insurance company until annual usage reaches threshold

column.name: threshold_amt
column.descr: Dollar amount after whcih insurance company pays 100% of the bill for these types of incidents

column.name: copay_amt
column.descr: The co-payment a policy holder has to pay for these types of incidents
